item.title: About Yongyan
item.description: Thanks for reading! I am a master student in the College of Cybersecurity, Sichuan University, China. My research focuses on cyber threat intelligence, attack detection, and web security. Education Experience Sichuan University, China (2016-2020) Bachelor of Engineering in Cybersecurity College of Cybersecurity Sichuan University, China (2020-) A master student majoring in Cybersecurity College of Cybersecurity Supervisors: Prof.Jiayong Liu and Prof.Cheng Huang Work Experience
